channel.title: Half-Life receives update to fix numerous issues and bugs
channel.description:
As per neowin.net article, "Half-Life receives update to fix numerous issues and bugs, might hide a secret message"[/size]
[url]https://www.neowin.net/news/half-life-receives-update-to-fix-numerous-issues-and-bugs-might-hide-a-secret-message[/url]

item.title: Half-Life receives update to fix numerous issues and bugs

item.description:
Wow, they fixed a couple bugs, looks like HL3 it’s just around the corner
